message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to own a product from my collection. As a seasoned seller, I can assure you that my products have a 33.33% chance of being high-quality. Since this is your first interaction with me, I'd like to start with a fair and transparent offer. The price for this product is $10000, and I'm confident that it will meet your expectations. Would you like to take a chance and see what you get?
I trust the transparency and fairness of your offer. Let's proceed with the purchase.

Welcome to my collection! I'm thrilled to introduce you to our latest addition. As you may know, our products have a 33.33% chance of being high-quality, and I'm excited to say that this one is indeed a high-quality product. With this in mind, I'd like to offer it to you at the same price of $10000. I believe the quality and value of this product speak for themselves, and I'm confident you'll be impressed. Would you like to take advantage of this rare opportunity?
Thank you for the recommendation and the opportunity. I trust your assessment and would like to purchase the product.
